content: complimentary pattern carina cowl design by bobbi intveld pattern no for use with 202434 prairie fingering for use with prairie fingering carina cowl design by bobbi intveld description knit with one hank of prairie this trellis stitch cowl is full of beautiful texture experience level gauge in trellis stitch 22 sts and 24 row = 4 intermediate sizes finished measurements 24 one circumference 12½ height materials yarn needles 5 5mm 24 circular needle prairie fingering size 9 or size needed to obtain gauge 53% suri alpaca 47% baby huacaya alpaca 50g/273yds 1 hank color shown no 1107 juniper other tools cable needle stitch marker tapestry needle p 02 blue sky fibers step no 1 cowl co 132 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts work rnds 1-12 of trellis stitch pattern six times then work rnds 1-3 once more bobble loosely in patt step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel stitch patterns trellis stitch pattern rnds 1-4 *p2 k2 p2 repeat from * to end round 5 *t3r t3l repeat from * to end rnds 6-10 *k1 p4 k1 repeat from * to end round 11 *t3l t3r repeat from * to end round 12 *p2 k2 p2 repeat from * to end repeat rnds 1-12 for trellis stitch pattern abbreviations bobble bind off t3l slip 1 stitch to cable needle co cast on hold to front purl 2 knit 1 from k knit cable needle p purl t3r slip 2 stitches to cable needle patt pattern hold to back knit 1 purl 2 from pm place marker cable needle repeat repeat * repeat the directions between the st s stitch es asterisks as many times as indicated p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2024 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 09012024 p 04
